Personal Details


Hello! My name is Sam and I'm a recent graduate who's looking to make an entrance in the IT field. In particular, I hope to enter the data science and analytics field. I graduated from Truman State University with a BS in mathematics and a minor in statistics.

Recently, I earned a certificate in data science and analytics from Washington University in St. Louis, and I hope to further my post-graduate education with a Masters in Data Science and Analytic Storytelling. On a more personal note, I really enjoy cooking, astronomy, and strategy games! I also have two cute cats named Cocoa and Nibs.
